title: For Sale: Green Cobb PSA 1, but it's a nice 1!
author: Centauri

posts.post_title: For Sale: Green Cobb PSA 1, but it's a nice 1!
posts.post_content: It really does look nice in hand. I bought this card about 4 months ago on this site, and decided to move on to something else. And not looking for top dollar - I paid $4K, selling for $3.5K. If interested, reply here on PM me.
Sold for $3250. I’ll be posting some more T206 in the coming days and weeks
